adrFormatAddress: 176 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text:
I really enjoyed my experience both online and in-person with Nectar. The staff were warm and engaging. My doctor, Dr. Ganju provided my diagnosis in my 1st session with several options that I will be exploring to ease the inflammation I deal with year round. I'm hopeful and excited about what's to come.
I highly recommend using concierge services like Nectar for specialized and customized care!

originalText.text:
For a long time I wanted to get an allergy test but didn’t know where to go. I was recommended Nectar by a friend of mine and I am extremely happy with the service they provided.

They took me right as I got in and made the whole allergy process as easy as possible.

Everyone was super nice and professional and I definitely will be recommending Nectar to others!

originalText.text:
I have been taking Nectar allergy drops for nearly three months now via their subscription program. I am very happy so far! I believe that my allergy symptoms and reactions are improved as compared to what they were before I started the therapy. I still have a long way to go as I just started the process, but I am optimistic things that will continue to improve over time.

I chose Nectar over several competing alternatives because I thought their process, messaging, and pricing were more clear (at least to me). I found everything to be well-explained, and I value their science-based approach to the therapy design.

Last, but not least, Nectar's customer service is fantastic! I have found them to be proactive and responsive to my needs and requests. I really appreciate Nectar's personalized approach towards their clients!

originalText.text:
The first couple of months using this product was great. It felt as if my allergies completely disappeared. I'm not sure if it's now the change in weather or simply the way my body is adapting to the drops, but I find that I am still occasionally relying on additional allergy support. Regardless, I understand this product is a long game and if the results I experienced out the gate are any indicator of my future success, I intend to keep at it.

I am giving Nectar 5 stars because I scheduled a follow up consultation and no one showed and there was no follow up, which is disapointing. Overall I believe this is a good product and will continue using it.

originalText.text: So far so good!  I'm on month 4 of taking these allergy drops. Nectar has been great to communicate with. I've had multiple allergy tests in the past & the test from Nectar identified the same allergies as the past places.  These drops are WAY less expensive then getting allergy shots & you have the convenience of having them at home instead of going into an office 1-2 times a week for a shot.
